description: Minimum required output for a LogMessage
title: com.xcitestudios.schema.Logging.LogMessage

___extra.description: Any extra data to store alongside the log entry.

___datetime.description: The datetime this log event occured (ISO8601 combined date/time format (including timezone) for storage).

___message.description: Message for the log but use printf standard for arguments where required.

___module.description: Optional module in the application that raised the log.

___severity.description: The severity of this log message.

___source.description: The identifier of the machine the log came from (IP, DNS name etc, any unique identifier).
